name: markdownlint
description: A Node.js style checker and lint tool for Markdown/CommonMark files.
author: David Anson (https://dlaa.me/)

scripts.build-config: npm run build-config-schema && npm run build-config-example
scripts.build-demo: cpy node_modules/markdown-it/dist/markdown-it.min.js demo && cd demo && rimraf markdownlint-browser.* && webpack --no-stats
scripts.build-example: npm install --no-save --ignore-scripts grunt grunt-cli gulp through2
scripts.ci: npm-run-all --continue-on-error --parallel test-cover lint declaration build-config build-demo && git diff --exit-code
scripts.clone-test-repos: mkdir test-repos && cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/eslint/eslint eslint-eslint --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet && git clone https://github.com/mkdocs/mkdocs mkdocs-mkdocs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet && git clone https://github.com/pi-hole/docs pi-hole-docs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-large: npm run clone-test-repos && cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/dotnet/docs dotnet-docs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.declaration: npm run build-declaration && npm run test-declaration
scripts.example: cd example && node standalone.js && grunt markdownlint --force && gulp markdownlint
scripts.test: ava test/markdownlint-test.js test/markdownlint-test-custom-rules.js test/markdownlint-test-helpers.js test/markdownlint-test-result-object.js test/markdownlint-test-scenarios.js
